name: Streaming Quality
description: Max streaming audio bitrate offered on free tier.

name: Unlimited Uploads
description: No limits on the number of uploads.

name: Ad-Free Interface
description: No ads shown in the user interface.

name: Comments
description: Users can comment directly on tracks.

name: Direct Messages
description: Messaging between users on the platform.

name: Scheduled Releases
description: Set the exact time your music goes live in advance.

name: Offline Mode
description: Ability to listen without an internet connection.

name: Remix Features
description: Tools for uploading and discovering remixes.

name: Gated Content
description: Artists control access with pay-to-unlock, follow-to-unlock, or NFT gating.

name: Rewards System
description: Users can earn rewards or incentives.

name: Direct UGC Upload
description: Users can upload original or derivative content.

name: Visualizer
description: A dynamic visual representation of the music you're playing.

name: Developer SDK
description: Tools for developers to access platform features.
